en.description: Every 12m traversed by Wall Running regenerates +10 Health over 1s. This effect can stack up to 3x.

ru.description: Every 12m traversed by Wall Running regenerates +10 Health over 1s. This effect can stack up to 3x.

ko.description: Every 12m traversed by Wall Running regenerates +10 Health over 1s. This effect can stack up to 3x.
